088    /**
089     * <p>Instances of this class can validate objects based on declared constraints.
090     * Constraints can either be declared using OVal's constraint annotations, XML configuration
091     * files or EJB3 JPA annotations.</p>
092     * 
093     * <p>This class is thread-safe.</p>
094     * 
095     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
096     * @see AnnotationsConfigurer
097     * @see JPAAnnotationsConfigurer
098     * @see POJOConfigurer
099     * @see XMLConfigurer
100     */
101    public class Validator implements IValidator
102    {
103            private static final Log LOG = Log.getLog(Validator.class);
104    
105            private static CollectionFactory collectionFactory = _createDefaultCollectionFactory();
106            private static OValContextRenderer contextRenderer = ToStringValidationContextRenderer.INSTANCE;
107            private static MessageResolver messageResolver = ResourceBundleMessageResolver.INSTANCE;
108    
109            private static CollectionFactory _createDefaultCollectionFactory()
110            {
111                    // if Javolution collection classes are found use them by default
112                    if (ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastMap")
113                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastSet")
114                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("javolution.util.FastTable"))
115                    {
116                            LOG.info("javolution.util collection classes are available.");
117    
118                            return new CollectionFactoryJavalutionImpl();
119                    }
120                    // else if Trove collection classes are found use them by default
121                    else if (ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("gnu.trove.THashMap")
122                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("gnu.trove.THashSet"))
123                    {
124                            LOG.info("gnu.trove collection classes are available.");
125    
126                            return new CollectionFactoryTroveImpl();
127                    }
128                    // else use JDK collection classes by default
129                    else
130                            return new CollectionFactoryJDKImpl();
131            }

258            private ExpressionLanguage _addExpressionLanguage(final String languageId,
259                            final ExpressionLanguage expressionLanguage) throws IllegalArgumentException
260            {
261                    Assert.notNull("languageId", languageId);
262                    Assert.notNull("expressionLanguage", expressionLanguage);
263    
264                    LOG.info("Expression language '{1}' registered: {2}", languageId, expressionLanguage);
265    
266                    expressionLanguages.put(languageId, expressionLanguage);
267                    return expressionLanguage;
268            }
269    
270            private ExpressionLanguage _initializeDefaultEL(final String languageId)
271            {
272                    // JavaScript support
273                    if (("javascript".equals(languageId) || "js".equals(languageId))
274                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.mozilla.javascript.Context"))
275                            return _addExpressionLanguage("js", _addExpressionLanguage("javascript",
276                                            new ExpressionLanguageJavaScriptImpl()));
277    
278                    // Groovy support
279                    else if ("groovy".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("groovy.lang.Binding"))
280                            return _addExpressionLanguage("groovy", new ExpressionLanguageGroovyImpl());
281    
282                    // BeanShell support
283                    else if (("beanshell".equals(languageId) || "bsh".equals(languageId))
284                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("bsh.Interpreter"))
285                            return _addExpressionLanguage("beanshell", _addExpressionLanguage("bsh",
286                                            new ExpressionLanguageBeanShellImpl()));
287    
288                    // OGNL support
289                    else if ("ognl".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("ognl.Ognl"))
290                            return _addExpressionLanguage("ognl", new ExpressionLanguageOGNLImpl());
291    
292                    // MVEL2 support
293                    else if ("mvel".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.mvel2.MVEL"))
294                            return _addExpressionLanguage("mvel", new ExpressionLanguageMVELImpl());
295    
296                    // JRuby support
297                    else if (("jruby".equals(languageId) || "ruby".equals(languageId))
298                                    && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.jruby.Ruby"))
299                            return _addExpressionLanguage("jruby", _addExpressionLanguage("ruby", new ExpressionLanguageJRubyImpl()));
300    
301                    // JEXL support
302                    else if ("jexl".equals(languageId) && ReflectionUtils.isClassPresent("org.apache.commons.jexl.ExpressionFactory"))
303                            return _addExpressionLanguage("jexl", new ExpressionLanguageJEXLImpl());
304    
305                    return null;
306            }
307    
308            /**
309             * validate validatedObject based on the constraints of the given class 
310             */
311            private void _validateObjectInvariants(final Object validatedObject, final Class< ? > clazz,
312                            final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final String[] profiles) throws ValidationFailedException
313            {
314                    assert validatedObject != null;
315                    assert clazz != null;
316                    assert violations != null;
317    
318                    // abort if the root class has been reached
319                    if (clazz == Object.class) return;
320    
321                    try
322                    {
323                            final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(clazz);
324    
325                            // validate field constraints
326                            for (final Field field : cc.constrainedFields)
327                            {
328                                    final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
329    
330                                    if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
331                                    {
332                                            final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.getFieldValue(field, validatedObject);
333                                            final FieldContext ctx = new FieldContext(field);
334    
335                                            for (final Check check : checks)
336                                            {
337                                                    checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, ctx, profiles);
338                                            }
339                                    }
340                            }
341    
342                            // validate constraints on getter methods
343                            for (final Method getter : cc.constrainedMethods)
344                            {
345                                    final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForMethodReturnValues.get(getter);
346    
347                                    if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
348                                    {
349                                            final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.invokeMethod(getter, validatedObject);
350                                            final MethodReturnValueContext ctx = new MethodReturnValueContext(getter);
351    
352                                            for (final Check check : checks)
353                                            {
354                                                    checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, ctx, profiles);
355                                            }
356                                    }
357                            }
358    
359                            // validate object constraints
360                            if (cc.checksForObject.size() > 0)
361                            {
362                                    final ClassContext ctx = new ClassContext(clazz);
363                                    for (final Check check : cc.checksForObject)
364                                    {
365                                            checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, validatedObject, ctx, profiles);
366                                    }
367                            }
368    
369                            // if the super class is annotated to be validatable also validate it against the object
370                            _validateObjectInvariants(validatedObject, clazz.getSuperclass(), violations, profiles);
371                    }
372                    catch (final OValException ex)
373                    {
374                            throw new ValidationFailedException("Object validation failed. Class: " + clazz + " Validated object: "
375                                            + validatedObject, ex);
376                    }
377            }
378    
379            /**
380             * Validates the static field and static getter constrains of the given class.
381             * Constraints specified for super classes are not taken in account.
382             */
383            private void _validateStaticInvariants(final Class< ? > validatedClass, final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
384                            final String[] profiles) throws ValidationFailedException
385            {
386                    assert validatedClass != null;
387                    assert violations != null;
388    
389                    final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(validatedClass);
390    
391                    // validate static field constraints
392                    for (final Field field : cc.constrainedStaticFields)
393                    {
394                            final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
395    
396                            if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
397                            {
398                                    final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.getFieldValue(field, null);
399                                    final FieldContext context = new FieldContext(field);
400    
401                                    for (final Check check : checks)
402                                    {
403                                            checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedClass, valueToValidate, context, profiles);
404                                    }
405                            }
406                    }
407    
408                    // validate constraints on getter methods
409                    for (final Method getter : cc.constrainedStaticMethods)
410                    {
411                            final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForMethodReturnValues.get(getter);
412    
413                            if (checks != null && checks.size() > 0)
414                            {
415                                    final Object valueToValidate = ReflectionUtils.invokeMethod(getter, null);
416                                    final MethodReturnValueContext context = new MethodReturnValueContext(getter);
417    
418                                    for (final Check check : checks)
419                                    {
420                                            checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedClass, valueToValidate, context, profiles);
421                                    }
422                            }
423                    }
424            }
425    
426            /**
427             * Registers object-level constraint checks
428             *  
429             * @param clazz
430             * @param checks
431             * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>clazz == null</code> or <code>checks == null</code> or checks is empty 
432             */
433            public void addChecks(final Class< ? > clazz, final Check... checks) throws IllegalArgumentException
434            {
435                    Assert.notNull("clazz", clazz);
436                    Assert.notEmpty("checks", checks);
437    
438                    getClassChecks(clazz).addObjectChecks(checks);
439            }
440    
441            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
442            protected void addChecks(final ClassChecks cc, final ClassConfiguration classCfg) throws OValException
443            {
444                    if (TRUE.equals(classCfg.overwrite)) cc.clear();
445    
446                    if (classCfg.checkInvariants != null) cc.isCheckInvariants = classCfg.checkInvariants;
447    
448                    // cache the result for better performance
449                    final boolean applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors = TRUE.equals(classCfg.applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors);
450                    final boolean applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = TRUE.equals(classCfg.applyFieldConstraintsToSetters);
451                    final boolean assertParametersNotNull = TRUE.equals(classCfg.assertParametersNotNull);
452                    final NotNullCheck sharedNotNullCheck = assertParametersNotNull ? new NotNullCheck() : null;
453    
454                    try
455                    {
456                            /* ******************************
457                             * apply object level checks
458                             * ******************************/
459                            if (classCfg.objectConfiguration != null)
460                            {
461                                    final ObjectConfiguration objectCfg = classCfg.objectConfiguration;
462    
463                                    if (TRUE.equals(objectCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearObjectChecks();
464    
465                                    cc.addObjectChecks(objectCfg.checks);
466                            }
467    
468                            /* ******************************
469                             * apply field checks
470                             * ******************************/
471                            if (classCfg.fieldConfigurations != null)
472                                    for (final FieldConfiguration fieldCfg : classCfg.fieldConfigurations)
473                                    {
474                                            final Field field = classCfg.type.getDeclaredField(fieldCfg.name);
475    
476                                            if (TRUE.equals(fieldCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearFieldChecks(field);
477    
478                                            if (fieldCfg.checks != null && fieldCfg.checks.size() > 0)
479                                                    cc.addFieldChecks(field, fieldCfg.checks);
480                                    }
481    
482                            /* ******************************
483                             * apply constructor parameter checks
484                             * ******************************/
485                            if (classCfg.constructorConfigurations != null)
486                                    for (final ConstructorConfiguration ctorCfg : classCfg.constructorConfigurations)
487                                    {
488                                            // ignore constructors without parameters
489                                            if (ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations == null) continue;
490    
491                                            final Class< ? >[] paramTypes = new Class[ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size()];
492    
493                                            for (int i = 0, l = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
494                                            {
495                                                    paramTypes[i] = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i).type;
496                                            }
497    
498                                            final Constructor ctor = classCfg.type.getDeclaredConstructor(paramTypes);
499    
500                                            if (TRUE.equals(ctorCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearConstructorChecks(ctor);
501    
502                                            if (TRUE.equals(ctorCfg.postCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPost.add(ctor);
503    
504                                            final String[] paramNames = parameterNameResolver.getParameterNames(ctor);
505    
506                                            for (int i = 0, l = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
507                                            {
508                                                    final ParameterConfiguration paramCfg = ctorCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i);
509    
510                                                    if (TRUE.equals(paramCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i);
511    
512                                                    if (paramCfg.hasChecks()) cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, paramCfg.checks);
513    
514                                                    if (paramCfg.hasCheckExclusions())
515                                                            cc.addConstructorParameterCheckExclusions(ctor, i, paramCfg.checkExclusions);
516    
517                                                    if (assertParametersNotNull) cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, sharedNotNullCheck);
518    
519                                                    /* *******************
520                                                     * applying field constraints to the single parameter of setter methods 
521                                                     * *******************/
522                                                    if (applyFieldConstraintsToConstructors)
523                                                    {
524                                                            final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getField(cc.clazz, paramNames[i]);
525    
526                                                            // check if a corresponding field has been found
527                                                            if (field != null && paramTypes[i].isAssignableFrom(field.getType()))
528                                                            {
529                                                                    final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
530                                                                    check.setFieldName(field.getName());
531                                                                    cc.addConstructorParameterChecks(ctor, i, check);
532                                                            }
533                                                    }
534                                            }
535                                    }
536    
537                            /* ******************************
538                             * apply method parameter and return value checks and pre/post conditions
539                             * ******************************/
540                            if (classCfg.methodConfigurations != null)
541                                    for (final MethodConfiguration methodCfg : classCfg.methodConfigurations)
542                                    {
543                                            /* ******************************
544                                             * determine the method
545                                             * ******************************/
546                                            final Method method;
547    
548                                            if (methodCfg.parameterConfigurations == null || methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size() == 0)
549                                                    method = classCfg.type.getDeclaredMethod(methodCfg.name);
550                                            else
551                                            {
552                                                    final Class< ? >[] paramTypes = new Class[methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size()];
553    
554                                                    for (int i = 0, l = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
555                                                    {
556                                                            paramTypes[i] = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i).type;
557                                                    }
558    
559                                                    method = classCfg.type.getDeclaredMethod(methodCfg.name, paramTypes);
560                                            }
561    
562                                            if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearMethodChecks(method);
563    
564                                            /* ******************************
565                                             * applying field constraints to the single parameter of setter methods 
566                                             * ******************************/
567                                            if (applyFieldConstraintsToSetters)
568                                            {
569                                                    final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getFieldForSetter(method);
570    
571                                                    // check if a corresponding field has been found
572                                                    if (field != null)
573                                                    {
574                                                            final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check = new AssertFieldConstraintsCheck();
575                                                            check.setFieldName(field.getName());
576                                                            cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, 0, check);
577                                                    }
578                                            }
579    
580                                            /* ******************************
581                                             * configure parameter constraints
582                                             * ******************************/
583                                            if (methodCfg.parameterConfigurations != null && methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size() > 0)
584                                                    for (int i = 0, l = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.size(); i < l; i++)
585                                                    {
586                                                            final ParameterConfiguration paramCfg = methodCfg.parameterConfigurations.get(i);
587    
588                                                            if (TRUE.equals(paramCfg.overwrite)) cc.clearMethodParameterChecks(method, i);
589    
590                                                            if (paramCfg.hasChecks()) cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, i, paramCfg.checks);
591    
592                                                            if (paramCfg.hasCheckExclusions())
593                                                                    cc.addMethodParameterCheckExclusions(method, i, paramCfg.checkExclusions);
594    
595                                                            if (assertParametersNotNull) cc.addMethodParameterChecks(method, i, sharedNotNullCheck);
596                                                    }
597    
598                                            /* ******************************
599                                             * configure return value constraints
600                                             * ******************************/
601                                            if (methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration != null)
602                                            {
603                                                    if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.overwrite))
604                                                            cc.clearMethodReturnValueChecks(method);
605    
606                                                    if (methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks != null
607                                                                    && methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
608                                                            cc.addMethodReturnValueChecks(method, methodCfg.isInvariant,
609                                                                            methodCfg.returnValueConfiguration.checks);
610                                            }
611    
612                                            if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.preCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPre.add(method);
613    
614                                            /*
615                                             * configure pre conditions
616                                             */
617                                            if (methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration != null)
618                                            {
619                                                    if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.overwrite))
620                                                            cc.clearMethodPreChecks(method);
621    
622                                                    if (methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks != null
623                                                                    && methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
624                                                            cc.addMethodPreChecks(method, methodCfg.preExecutionConfiguration.checks);
625                                            }
626    
627                                            if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.postCheckInvariants)) cc.methodsWithCheckInvariantsPost.add(method);
628    
629                                            /*
630                                             * configure post conditions
631                                             */
632                                            if (methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration != null)
633                                            {
634                                                    if (TRUE.equals(methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.overwrite))
635                                                            cc.clearMethodPostChecks(method);
636    
637                                                    if (methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks != null
638                                                                    && methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks.size() > 0)
639                                                            cc.addMethodPostChecks(method, methodCfg.postExecutionConfiguration.checks);
640                                            }
641                                    }
642                    }
643                    catch (final NoSuchMethodException ex)
644                    {
645                            throw new MethodNotFoundException(ex);
646                    }
647                    catch (final NoSuchFieldException ex)
648                    {
649                            throw new FieldNotFoundException(ex);
650                    }
651            }
652    
653            /**

685            /**
686             * Registers a new constraint set.
687             * 
688             * @param constraintSet cannot be null
689             * @param overwrite
690             * @throws ConstraintSetAlreadyDefinedException if <code>overwrite == false</code> and
691             *                                                                                              a constraint set with the given id exists already 
692             * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>constraintSet == null</code> 
693             *                                                                      or <code>constraintSet.id == null</code> 
694             *                                                                      or <code>constraintSet.id.length == 0</code>
695             * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>constraintSet.id == null</code>
696             */
697            public void addConstraintSet(final ConstraintSet constraintSet, final boolean overwrite)
698                            throws ConstraintSetAlreadyDefinedException, IllegalArgumentException
699            {
700                    Assert.notNull("constraintSet", constraintSet);
701                    Assert.notEmpty("constraintSet.id", constraintSet.getId());
702    
703                    synchronized (constraintSetsById)
704                    {
705                            if (!overwrite && constraintSetsById.containsKey(constraintSet.getId()))
706                                    throw new ConstraintSetAlreadyDefinedException(constraintSet.getId());
707    
708                            constraintSetsById.put(constraintSet.getId(), constraintSet);
709                    }
710            }

747    
748            protected void checkConstraint(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final Check check,
749                            final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
750                            final String[] profiles) throws OValException
751            {
752                    if (!isAnyProfileEnabled(check.getProfiles(), profiles)) return;
753    
754                    /*
755                     * special handling of the AssertValid constraint
756                     */
757                    if (check instanceof AssertValidCheck)
758                    {
759                            checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, (AssertValidCheck) check, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context,
760                                            profiles);
761                            return;
762                    }
763    
764                    /*
765                     * special handling of the FieldConstraints constraint
766                     */
767                    if (check instanceof AssertConstraintSetCheck)
768                    {
769                            checkConstraintAssertConstraintSet(violations, (AssertConstraintSetCheck) check, validatedObject,
770                                            valueToValidate, context, profiles);
771                            return;
772                    }
773    
774                    /*
775                     * special handling of the FieldConstraints constraint
776                     */
777                    if (check instanceof AssertFieldConstraintsCheck)
778                    {
779                            checkConstraintAssertFieldConstraints(violations, (AssertFieldConstraintsCheck) check, validatedObject,
780                                            valueToValidate, context, profiles);
781                            return;
782                    }
783    
784                    /*
785                     * standard constraints handling
786                     */
787                    if (!check.isSatisfied(validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, this))
788                    {
789                            final String errorMessage = renderMessage(context, valueToValidate, check.getMessage(), check
790                                            .getMessageVariables());
791                            violations.add(new ConstraintViolation(check, errorMessage, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context));
792                    }
793            }
794    
795            protected void checkConstraintAssertConstraintSet(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
796                            final AssertConstraintSetCheck check, final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate,
797                            final OValContext context, final String[] profiles) throws OValException
798            {
799                    final ConstraintSet cs = getConstraintSet(check.getId());
800    
801                    if (cs == null) throw new UndefinedConstraintSetException(check.getId());
802    
803                    final Collection<Check> referencedChecks = cs.getChecks();
804    
805                    if (referencedChecks != null && referencedChecks.size() > 0)
806                            for (final Check referencedCheck : referencedChecks)
807                                    checkConstraint(violations, referencedCheck, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, profiles);
808            }
809    
810            protected void checkConstraintAssertFieldConstraints(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
811                            final AssertFieldConstraintsCheck check, final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate,
812                            final OValContext context, final String[] profiles) throws OValException
813            {
814                    final Class< ? > targetClass;
815    
816                    /*
817                     * set the targetClass based on the validation context
818                     */
819                    if (context instanceof ConstructorParameterContext)
820                            // the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the constructor or one of its super
821                            // classes
822                            targetClass = ((ConstructorParameterContext) context).getConstructor().getDeclaringClass();
823                    else if (context instanceof MethodParameterContext)
824                            // the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the method or one of its super classes
825                            targetClass = ((MethodParameterContext) context).getMethod().getDeclaringClass();
826                    else if (context instanceof MethodReturnValueContext)
827                            // the class declaring the field must either be the class declaring the getter or one of its super classes
828                            targetClass = ((MethodReturnValueContext) context).getMethod().getDeclaringClass();
829                    else if (check.getDeclaringClass() != null && check.getDeclaringClass() != Void.class)
830                            targetClass = check.getDeclaringClass();
831                    else
832                            // the lowest class that is expected to declare the field (or one of its super classes)
833                            targetClass = validatedObject.getClass();
834    
835                    // the name of the field whose constraints shall be used
836                    String fieldName = check.getFieldName();
837    
838                    /*
839                     * calculate the field name based on the validation context if the @FieldConstraints constraint didn't specify the field name
840                     */
841                    if (fieldName == null || fieldName.length() == 0)
842                            if (context instanceof ConstructorParameterContext)
843                                    fieldName = ((ConstructorParameterContext) context).getParameterName();
844                            else if (context instanceof MethodParameterContext)
845                                    fieldName = ((MethodParameterContext) context).getParameterName();
846                            else if (context instanceof MethodReturnValueContext)
847                                    fieldName = ReflectionUtils.guessFieldName(((MethodReturnValueContext) context).getMethod());
848    
849                    /*
850                     * find the field based on fieldName and targetClass
851                     */
852                    final Field field = ReflectionUtils.getFieldRecursive(targetClass, fieldName);
853    
854                    if (field == null)
855                            throw new FieldNotFoundException("Field <" + fieldName + "> not found in class <" + targetClass
856                                            + "> or its super classes.");
857    
858                    final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(field.getDeclaringClass());
859                    final Collection<Check> referencedChecks = cc.checksForFields.get(field);
860                    if (referencedChecks != null && referencedChecks.size() > 0)
861                            for (final Check referencedCheck : referencedChecks)
862                                    checkConstraint(violations, referencedCheck, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context, profiles);
863            }
864    
865            protected void checkConstraintAssertValid(final List<ConstraintViolation> violations, final AssertValidCheck check,
866                            final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
867                            final String[] profiles) throws OValException
868            {
869                    if (valueToValidate == null) return;
870    
871                    // ignore circular dependencies
872                    if (isCurrentlyValidated(valueToValidate)) return;
873    
874                    final List<ConstraintViolation> additionalViolations = collectionFactory.createList();
875                    validateInvariants(valueToValidate, additionalViolations, profiles);
876    
877                    if (additionalViolations.size() != 0)
878                    {
879                            final String errorMessage = renderMessage(context, valueToValidate, check.getMessage(), check
880                                            .getMessageVariables());
881    
882                            violations.add(new ConstraintViolation(check, errorMessage, validatedObject, valueToValidate, context,
883                                            additionalViolations));
884                    }
885    
886                    // if the value to validate is a collection also validate the collection items
887                    if (valueToValidate instanceof Collection && check.isRequireValidElements())
888                            for (final Object item : (Collection< ? >) valueToValidate)
889                                    checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles);
890                    else if (valueToValidate instanceof Map && check.isRequireValidElements())
891                    {
892                            for (final Object item : ((Map< ? , ? >) valueToValidate).keySet())
893                                    checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles);
894    
895                            for (final Object item : ((Map< ? , ? >) valueToValidate).values())
896                                    checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles);
897                    }
898    
899                    // if the value to validate is an array also validate the array elements
900                    else if (valueToValidate.getClass().isArray() && check.isRequireValidElements())
901                            for (final Object item : (Object[]) valueToValidate)
902                                    checkConstraintAssertValid(violations, check, validatedObject, item, context, profiles);
903            }

1005            /**
1006             * Returns the ClassChecks object for the particular class,
1007             * allowing you to modify the checks
1008             * 
1009             * @param clazz cannot be null
1010             * @return returns the ClassChecks for the given class
1011             * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>clazz == null</code>
1012             * @throws OValException
1013             */
1014            protected ClassChecks getClassChecks(final Class< ? > clazz) throws IllegalArgumentException, OValException
1015            {
1016                    Assert.notNull("clazz", clazz);
1017    
1018                    synchronized (checksByClass)
1019                    {
1020                            ClassChecks cc = checksByClass.get(clazz);
1021    
1022                            if (cc == null)
1023                            {
1024                                    cc = new ClassChecks(clazz);
1025    
1026                                    for (final Configurer configurer : configurers)
1027                                    {
1028                                            final ClassConfiguration classConfig = configurer.getClassConfiguration(clazz);
1029                                            if (classConfig != null) addChecks(cc, classConfig);
1030                                    }
1031    
1032                                    checksByClass.put(clazz, cc);
1033                            }
1034    
1035                            return cc;
1036                    }
1037            }

1047            public ConstraintSet getConstraintSet(final String constraintSetId) throws InvalidConfigurationException
1048            {
1049                    Assert.notNull("constraintSetsById", constraintSetsById);
1050                    synchronized (constraintSetsById)
1051                    {
1052                            ConstraintSet cs = constraintSetsById.get(constraintSetId);
1053    
1054                            if (cs == null) for (final Configurer configurer : configurers)
1055                            {
1056                                    final ConstraintSetConfiguration csc = configurer.getConstraintSetConfiguration(constraintSetId);
1057                                    if (csc != null)
1058                                    {
1059                                            cs = new ConstraintSet(csc.id);
1060                                            cs.setChecks(csc.checks);
1061    
1062                                            addConstraintSet(cs, csc.overwrite != null && csc.overwrite);
1063                                    }
1064                            }
1065                            return cs;
1066                    }
1067            }

1098            /**
1099             * Determines if at least one of the given profiles is enabled
1100             * 
1101             * @param profilesOfCheck
1102             * @param enabledProfiles optional array of profiles (can be null)
1103             * @return Returns true if at least one of the given profiles is enabled. 
1104             */
1105            protected boolean isAnyProfileEnabled(final String[] profilesOfCheck, final String[] enabledProfiles)
1106            {
1107                    if (enabledProfiles == null)
1108                    {
1109                            // use the global profile configuration
1110                            if (profilesOfCheck == null || profilesOfCheck.length == 0) return isProfileEnabled("default");
1111    
1112                            for (final String profile : profilesOfCheck)
1113                                    if (isProfileEnabled(profile)) return true;
1114                    }
1115                    else
1116                    {
1117                            // use the local profile configuration
1118                            if (profilesOfCheck == null || profilesOfCheck.length == 0)
1119                                    return ArrayUtils.containsEqual(enabledProfiles, "default");
1120    
1121                            for (final String profile : profilesOfCheck)
1122                                    if (ArrayUtils.containsEqual(enabledProfiles, profile)) return true;
1123                    }
1124                    return false;
1125            }

1129             * 
1130             * @param object
1131             * @return Returns true if the given object is currently validated in the current thread.
1132             */
1133            protected boolean isCurrentlyValidated(final Object object)
1134            {
1135                    Assert.notNull("object", object);
1136                    return currentlyValidatedObjects.get().getLast().contains(object);
1137            }

1139            /**
1140             * Determines if the given profile is enabled.
1141             * 
1142             * @param profileId
1143             * @return Returns true if the given profile is enabled.
1144             */
1145            public boolean isProfileEnabled(final String profileId)
1146            {
1147                    Assert.notNull("profileId", profileId);
1148                    if (isProfilesFeatureUsed)
1149                    {
1150                            if (isAllProfilesEnabledByDefault) return !disabledProfiles.contains(profileId);
1151    
1152                            return enabledProfiles.contains(profileId);
1153                    }
1154                    return true;
1155            }

1234            protected String renderMessage(final OValContext context, final Object value, final String messageKey,
1235                            final Map<String, String> messageValues)
1236            {
1237                    String message = MessageRenderer.renderMessage(messageKey, messageValues);
1238    
1239                    // if there are no place holders in the message simply return it
1240                    if (message.indexOf('{') == -1) return message;
1241    
1242                    message = StringUtils.replaceAll(message, "{context}", contextRenderer.render(context));
1243                    message = StringUtils.replaceAll(message, "{invalidValue}", value == null ? "null" : value.toString());
1244    
1245                    return message;
1246            }

1256            protected RuntimeException translateException(final OValException ex)
1257            {
1258                    if (exceptionTranslator != null)
1259                    {
1260                            final RuntimeException rex = exceptionTranslator.translateException(ex);
1261                            if (rex != null) return rex;
1262                    }
1263                    return ex;
1264            }

1266            /**
1267             * {@inheritDoc}
1268             */
1269            public List<ConstraintViolation> validate(final Object validatedObject) throws IllegalArgumentException,
1270                            ValidationFailedException
1271            {
1272                    Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1273    
1274                    // create a new set for this validation cycle
1275                    currentlyValidatedObjects.get().add(new IdentitySet<Object>(4));
1276                    try
1277                    {
1278                            final List<ConstraintViolation> violations = collectionFactory.createList();
1279                            validateInvariants(validatedObject, violations, (String[]) null);
1280                            return violations;
1281                    }
1282                    finally
1283                    {
1284                            // remove the set
1285                            currentlyValidatedObjects.get().removeLast();
1286                    }
1287            }
1288    
1289            /**
1290             * {@inheritDoc}
1291             */
1292            public List<ConstraintViolation> validate(final Object validatedObject, final String... profiles)
1293                            throws IllegalArgumentException, ValidationFailedException
1294            {
1295                    Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1296    
1297                    // create a new set for this validation cycle
1298                    currentlyValidatedObjects.get().add(new IdentitySet<Object>(4));
1299                    try
1300                    {
1301                            final List<ConstraintViolation> violations = collectionFactory.createList();
1302                            validateInvariants(validatedObject, violations, profiles);
1303                            return violations;
1304                    }
1305                    finally
1306                    {
1307                            // remove the set
1308                            currentlyValidatedObjects.get().removeLast();
1309                    }
1310            }
1311    
1312            /**
1313             * {@inheritDoc}
1314             */
1315            public List<ConstraintViolation> validateFieldValue(final Object validatedObject, final Field validatedField,
1316                            final Object fieldValueToValidate) throws IllegalArgumentException, ValidationFailedException
1317            {
1318                    Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1319                    Assert.notNull("validatedField", validatedField);
1320    
1321                    // create a new set for this validation cycle
1322                    currentlyValidatedObjects.get().add(new IdentitySet<Object>(4));
1323                    try
1324                    {
1325                            final ClassChecks cc = getClassChecks(validatedField.getDeclaringClass());
1326                            final Collection<Check> checks = cc.checksForFields.get(validatedField);
1327    
1328                            final List<ConstraintViolation> violations = collectionFactory.createList();
1329    
1330                            if (checks == null || checks.size() == 0) return violations;
1331    
1332                            final FieldContext context = new FieldContext(validatedField);
1333    
1334                            for (final Check check : checks)
1335                                    checkConstraint(violations, check, validatedObject, fieldValueToValidate, context, null);
1336                            return violations;
1337                    }
1338                    catch (final OValException ex)
1339                    {
1340                            throw new ValidationFailedException("Field validation failed. Field: " + validatedField
1341                                            + " Validated object: " + validatedObject, ex);
1342                    }
1343                    finally
1344                    {
1345                            // remove the set
1346                            currentlyValidatedObjects.get().removeLast();
1347                    }
1348    
1349            }
1350    
1351            /**
1352             * validates the field and getter constrains of the given object.
1353             * if the given object is a class the static fields and getters
1354             * are validated.
1355             * 
1356             * @param validatedObject the object to validate, cannot be null
1357             * @throws ValidationFailedException
1358             * @throws IllegalArgumentException if <code>validatedObject == null</code>
1359             */
1360            protected void validateInvariants(final Object validatedObject, final List<ConstraintViolation> violations,
1361                            final String[] profiles) throws IllegalArgumentException, ValidationFailedException
1362            {
1363                    Assert.notNull("validatedObject", validatedObject);
1364    
1365                    currentlyValidatedObjects.get().getLast().add(validatedObject);
1366                    if (validatedObject instanceof Class)
1367                            _validateStaticInvariants((Class< ? >) validatedObject, violations, profiles);
1368                    else
1369                            _validateObjectInvariants(validatedObject, validatedObject.getClass(), violations, profiles);
1370            }
1371    }
